name: Dollar Dungeon 3 (Beta)
description:
In this third installment of the Dollar Dungeon series, you play as the hero of a village going though a rite-of-passage. In this Temple, you fight though rooms of monsters, and choose the difficulty of each room after. Can you do well enough to pass the trials, will you fail horribly and bring same to your village? Or will you exceed all expectations?

This game is entering beta, and need your input on how best to adjust the strength of each monster. Please post comments on your playthoughs, and post any bugs you may encounter.
